osvSchema.summary: IBM/integrity-enforcer: Incorrect conversion between integer types
osvSchema.details:
IBM/integrity-enforcer: Incorrect conversion between integer types

Converting the result of `strconv.Atoi`, `strconv.ParseInt`, and `strconv.ParseUint` to integer types of smaller bit size can produce unexpected values.
This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in IBM/integrity-enforcer version 0.2.0 by commit 73c46f4871555660002d677b713395ae3eab7574. For more details please see the references link.
